plot outline: A notorious gang from Bangalore gets arrested by the police for robbing a famous bank in Hyderabad. Amidst police investigations and all the chaos, the bag with the money they robbed goes missing. Meanwhile, a small gang of thieves learns about this and begins to search for the bag. ACP Durga Bhavani is the top cop brought in to solve the case.
title: Looty
plot: A notorious gang from Bangalore gets arrested by the police for robbing a famous bank in Hyderabad. Amidst police investigations and all the chaos, the bag with the money they robbed goes missing. Meanwhile, a small gang of thieves learns about this and begins to search for the bag. ACP Durga Bhavani is the top cop brought in to solve the case.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
